text: LG G4 is a smartphone developed by LG. It was released in South Korea on 29 April 2015. It was released in worldwide on June 2015. == Features == LG G4 has 5.5 inch IPS LCD screen, 3GB RAM, 16MP HDR wide back camera, 8MP selfie camera, 3000mAh battery capacity, Qualcomm Snapdragon 808 (20 nm) chipset, 32GB storage, 18W wired charger and Adreno 418 CPU. == Software == LG G4 run Android 5.1.1 Lollipop, it can upgrade to other versions like Android 6.0 Marshmallow and Android 7.0 Nougat when they came out. == Reviews == The Guardian reviews the LG G4, it has good reviews such as great screen, very good camera, more storage, removable battery and KnockCode, it has bad reviews such as does not have a premium materials, plastic back easily scratched and no built-in wireless charger. == References == == Other websites == * Category:Mobile phones introduced in 2015 Category:LG mobile phones
title: LG G4
